official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that military service which is creditable for certain military retired pay benefits shall not also be creditable for purposes of civil service retirement benefits.

summary.text: Provides that non-regular military service which is creditable for purposes of military retired pay benefits shall not be creditable for purposes of civil service retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that military service which is creditable for certain military retired pay benefits shall not also be creditable for purposes of civil service retirement benefits.
